comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: I went looking for the "rathskeller." to see if I could locate it. books.google.com/books?id=aAoEAAAAMBAJ&pg=PA64&lp... Billboard from Nov 21,1953 indicates that the Rathskeller was destroyed in a fire caused by a storm. books.google.com/books?id=bCAEAAAAMBAJ&pg=PA59&lp... Billboard from March 1957 offers a Rathskeller "near Aquarium" for lease, but of course it doesn't have to be in the same place, given the 1953 fire.
